detectors.description: function isContract(address account) internal view returns (bool) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PerpLpRewards.sol)#433

PerpLpRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PerpLpRewards.sol#711-726) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PerpLpRewards.sol#717)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PerpLpRewards.sol#720)
